note.p: Death: At sea, returning from America (20 October 1878)
Career: Assistant Surgeon, St Bartholomew's Hospital (1861) and Surgeon (1871); Lecturer in Anatomy, St Bartholomew's Hospital School; died of Bright's disease whilst returning from a holiday
Notes: In pencil on election certificate: 'ordered for publication in the Transactions of the Society' crossed out, and 'printed in Phil Trans 1869' inserted
